entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to 600 metres overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 600 metres. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
